HeroSection.subtitle: A telegram and discord based tipping bot, enable users        <br class='page:lt-md:hidden editor:phone:hidden' /> send and tip Solana and other SPL tokens

Providing trust and Confidence
for
long term projects and communities on

ethos.title: Our Ethos
content: TekFinance is a crypto reward, gifting and distribution system             for friends, families, influencers, group managers, founders,             developers and more. <br class='page:lt-md:hidden editor:phone:hidden' /> Beyond just             rewarding and tipping, we offer loyalty programs through our             open loyalty initiatives.

TekBot is powered by TekFinance, designed specifically as an              decentralized management tool in Telegram groups and Discord              server for rewarding users in Sol and other SPL tokens.

The idea behind TekFinance tipping bot is to enable users to             send zero-fee digital assets payment using social tags to             enhance community engagement with no wallet app installs             necessary.

reasons.title:
Effortless crypto
Distribution
reasons.description: TekFinance simplifies sending cryptocurrency to anyone using social tags, eliminating the need for complex crypto distribution.

reasons.title: Rich gifting and rewards
reasons.description: TekFinance offers a unique crypto gifting and rewarding system beyond just tipping.

reasons.title: Loyalty Program Integration
reasons.description: TekFinance offers an open loyalty program system that enables businesses to create crypto based reward programs, boosting customer engagement

reasons.title: Secure and reliable platform
reasons.description: TekFinance prioritizes security, providing a safe and reliable platform for users to send and receive theirc cryptocurreny with peace of mind.

reasons.title: Frictionless Transactions
reasons.description: TekFinance simplifies crypto transactions with social tags, eliminating complex wallet address.

reasons.title: Fast Redeem Link
reasons.description: TekFinance offer easy redeem link for hassle-free claiming of crypto gifts and rewards.

features.title: Personal
features.description: Users can easily transfer cryptocurrencies to their contacts using the platform

features.title: Community
features.description: Community managers and project managers can use this bot to          randomly tip their community members, Perhaps during games or when          tasks are completed

features.title: Organisation
features.description: Organisations can use TekBot to pay salaries and reward workers during award events

Footer.motto: Building a sustainable Financial Reward <br className='phone:hidden' /> System On Solana
